info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 4:01PM MDT until July 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Colorado and west central Colorado, including the following counties, in northwest Colorado, Garfield. In west central Colorado, Mesa. * WHEN...Until 700 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 401 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 0.3 and 0.8 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Clear Creek, Roan Creek and Tom Creek drainages.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
